Watergate Affair
lead_paragraph: The governor signed a deal with Brazilian institutions to develop a plan for cleaning up the the city’s sewage-strewn Guanabara Bay.
snippet: The governor signed a deal with Brazilian institutions to develop a plan for cleaning up the the city’s sewage-strewn Guanabara Bay.
